SELECT p.`Product_id`,p.`P_imgpath`,h.`tips`,h.`Specific_address`,h.`describes`,h.`Reservation_Notes`,h.`h_id`,h.`h_name`,c.`pictrue`,c.`cs_name`,h.`Star_class`,h.`purchases_Number`,p.`P_price`,h.`picture1`,h.`pictrue2` FROM hotel h INNER JOIN product p ON h.`Product_id`=p.`Product_id` INNER JOIN citiesstates c ON h.`cs_id`=c.`cs_id`
h.h_id = #{id}

SELECT * FROM hotel h INNER JOIN product p ON h.Product_id = p.Product_id INNER JOIN roominformation r ON r.h_id = h.h_id
h.h_id = #{id}

SELECT hl.h_Id,l.lable_name FROM hotellabel hl INNER JOIN labels l ON hl.lable_id=l.lable_id INNER JOIN hotel h ON h.h_id = hl.h_id
hl.h_id = #{id}
SELECT p.Product_id,pt.name,pt.describes FROM preferentialactivities pt INNER JOIN product p ON pt.Product_id = p.Product_id INNER JOIN hotel h ON pt.Product_id = h.Product_id where h.h_id = #{id}
